title: In which cultures is the thumbs-up gesture a sign of disrespect or derision? - Quora

response.answer_text: None of the cultures. This is something you made up. After giving the thumbs-up sign you must have wondered about the thumbs-down sign. Obviously thumbs-down would be a no, no anywhere, but what if somewhere thumbs-up has a different meaning. So you decided to go on Quora, knowing well that some moron will answer it. Guess what? You were right.

Here are two cents from interacting with people from different cultures: Australia: Shows disrespectMiddle East: Considered offensiveNigeria: Considered a sign of derisionFrance: Means “okay”United Kingdom: Means approvalUnited States/Canada: Means approvalRussia: Means approval
